description.value:
Contact is made with a powerful warp entity such as a Greater Daemon to teach the rites of a Warp Ritual or give their unholy blessing on it. Given example: A Ritual Capable of transporting a small warband from one world to another.

Effect: Extremely Rare

Notes: -
